channel.title: Star Trek on Trek Relaunch Book Club
channel.description: Recent content in Star Trek on Trek Relaunch Book Club

item.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation: Q&A Book Review (7)
item.description:
When Q comes on the TV, I groan and think oh great this one is a Q episode… Can Keith R.A. DeCandido do the near-impossible and write a decent Q novel?

Spoilers ahead!
